title: TO_START_OF_WEEK
description: Returns the date representing the first day of the week for a specified date.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The input date used to determine the start date of its corresponding week.

examples:
TO_START_OF_WEEK(DATE(2025, 4, 16))
-- Returns 2025-04-13, the Sunday before April 16, 2025 (a Wednesday).
